My situation:
Cycle starts on 80th instance.
Cycle is 35 elements long.
(1_000_000_000 - 80) % 35 = 10.

Sample:
Cycle starts on 2nd instance.
Cycle is 7 instances long.
(1_000_000_000 - 2) % 7 = 4.

69
69
65
(64) (4th element)
